DOC.detailed_description: Voluntary medical male circumcision ( VMMC ) priority preventive intervention HIV transmission . Currently , widely use VMMC technique South Africa open surgical circumcision . According Framework Clinical Evaluation Devices Adult Male Circumcision ( WHO , 2011 ) : `` WHO health authority wish identify one device ( ) would make VMMC safer , easy , quicker ; ( b ) would rapid heal current method and/or might entail less risk HIV transmission post-operative period ; ( c ) could perform safely health-care provider minimal level training ; ( ) would cost-effective compare standard surgical method male circumcision scale . '' This randomize controlled trial compare open surgical technique alternative minimally-invasive technique use disposable Unicirc device tissue adhesive . The investigator postulate VMMC use Unicirc device meet WHO criteria ideal method scale : easy technique learn perform , require less intraoperative time , safer surgeon patient , heals quicker , cost effective currently available technique . The disposable nature device immense advantage eliminates need sterilize therefore used resource-limited setting . It also reduce chance infection cause contaminated instrument . The study randomly assign participant one two group : - Unicirc device tissue adhesive : 100 men - Open surgical circumcision : 50 men The participant evaluate follow-up visit 2 day , 7 day , 14 day , 28 day surgery .
